intro: [WRONG START] Starsea umbellata, commonly known as the star-shaped umbrella plant, is a flowering plant characterized by its distinctive inflorescence. It features a tall, branching stem that supports a cluster of small, white, star-shaped flowers. The leaves are typically lance-shaped and arranged alternately along the stem. Native to tropical regions, it thrives in humid, well-drained soil. This plant is often cultivated for its ornamental value due to its unique floral display.
